description: directs the "Aikatsu boot camp" on an uninhabited island, where aspiring Idols who have deficits in their performance, to be brought up to speed. The camp has a reputation for being incredibly hard and actually requires the Sergeant them at the beginning physically a lot from, but this was actually only the warm-up in the end. The accent of the instructor reveals he is from America. He also operates an idol training camp, participated in the Hoshimiya Ichigo during their one-year stay in the USA. He`s still in good memory, because, in spite of the language barrier made it, to go along with everyone else in the camp of their courage and dedication.
name: Pepper-gunsou
